column4: I'm in mahasona user , I need to add root permission on this account
use sudo for it
or add yourself to www-data group
how can I add to www-data ?
hold on
thankx
are you on normal ubuntu or server install? and which version?
normal ubuntu machine
11.10v Myrtti
you're using unity? hit Super (Windows) key, type in group - it should show "Users and Groups" - start that
I changed my group in to root , but it changes back
tap "Manage Groups" - pick www-data - properties - tick your username
and don't change your group to root.
ok I changed my group to www-data
how, from advanced settings or the way I told you to?
from advanced settings :/
don't do that :-(
ok ok I did the way u asked me
change your group in the advanced settings as the one it was as well
I did , still I cant paste files into www folder
you need to relogin
